text: danuma bedagamu: ganithamaya gataluwa 7
adhyapana wadath hondinma karagena, diga gamanak yanna oyata man hadawathinma suba pathanawa.
hethuwak wi thibe.

aya badu wishesha widhiwidhana panatha prakarawa thirubadu rahithawa parlimenthu manthriwarunta sukhopabhogi wahana genwimata labadun awasaraya matha manthriwarun 70 deneku mewana wita wahana genwa athayi nithignya nagananda kodithuwakku mahatha penwadeyi.

sanniwedana saha kriyakari bahuwa…sakewin handunwamu mokakda me winas wyapruthiya kiyanne kiyala…anagatha wadi darshanikayeku, widyagnyayeku ha prakata chinthakayeku wana jak fresko wisin 1972 warshayedi amarikawe florida pranthaye okichobi nam wil there, “winas” sthanayedi aarambha karana wyapruthiya thamayi winas wyapruthiya lesa handunwanne…mema wyapruthiye aramunu monawada kiyana eka, ema wyapruthiyema nila web adawiyen ukaha gamu…
:) nuba suwada lan karana ma diwiya ..
eeth api me katha karanna sarasenne oya kiyana sammatha simawen eha giyapu nawa yeruwaniyak ganayi.
“rate ha rajaye thorathuru ha sanniwedana thakshana prayathisanskarana ha sanwardhanayata aadhara wena prigami aayathanika prethipaththiyak ha niyamana parisarayak nirmanaya kirima.”

yahapalakayo ‘dadayam teli natya’ badu mila wadi karala…
ithin onna oya ayath me kathawa dan dannawa.

mita amatharawa kolambaa sita nawa kalani palama dakwa kulunu matha idiwana margaye idikirim katayuthu wegawath kirimata menma dakshina adhiwegi margaye mathara sita hambanthota dakwa wana kotase wada awasan kirimata da upades laba di thibenawa.
ee deka athara…
‘pongdak hina wenna!’
adhyapanaya, indriya damanaya, silwath bawa, sanwara bawa, duradiga kalpana kirime hakiyawa wani wadagath karunu jiwithayaka kuda awadiye di ma labunoth ee jiwithaya udara bawata pathwenawa.
ma namawanne ho atawanne sitina wita mohu guwan widuliye sinhala sewaye "giyaka rasa" naminda ingrisi sewaye " ්rae ptsaba " naminda wadasatahan dwithwayak idiripath kaleya.

ema sinama abhilashayata pitubalaya sapayana udara aramunak gana da ohu thana thana kiya thibini.

ithin eda indan thamath ee prashneta pilithurak hoyanawa mama..thamath me danuth mawila penawa ee siduwima..chutibaba asdeka piyagena pettiyak athule..loku ammalage gedara sale madde..nilpata lassana gawumak andala..nil sapaththu dekak dala..pettiya wateta mal..loku amma andanawa..mama ammage dakunu athe mage ath dekenma ellila ee saleta athul une..

onna ohoma loku udawiya poddak wadeta bassanam anith aya ibema bahiyi.

siriyanu hamuda nagenahira gutha pradeshayata prahara ella kirima aarambha kara me wanawita masayak gatha wena athara pasugiya masayaka kalayedi ella wu praharawalin dahasakata aasanna pirisak jiwithakshayata pathwa thibe.
demala basata thibu wadagathkama kotte yugaye sita pawathi bawa pahadili ya.
ee wenuwata laksha dahayak denna yayi..
owun yudhayata noyanne ee nisaya.
♦ hambanthota gowiyo parata basi..
pahan paththu kirima sadaha wiwidha thel warga bhawitha karana athara eya thama aramuna anuwa wenas we.
mema sakachchawata pasubima sakasuwe mahinda maithri dedena samagi karawima wenuwen depaththema kriyathmaka wu kandayamya.
eya dhanathmaka wuwath, mage loku balaporoththuwak naha.
lankawedi nam harak mas kanne na.

loke purama thiyena hama kunu godakatama welada polak nowi yam palanayak thibuna nam hondayi kiyala hithenawa. 70- 77 thibu honda lakshana ithuru kara gena yam pamanaka wiwurtha aarthikayak goda naguna nam kopamana hondada .
eheth, metharam aahara thogayak sathwa aahara lesa yoda no gena winasha kirima aparadhayaki.

aduru paha wu thol rosa paha karaganna me winadi deke prathikaraya sidu karanna me widiyata bandakka yusha panaya kaloth obata siduwena de obawa puduma karawayi obe kalu wunu kakul niliyakage wage sudu karaganna menna hodama kramaya 100% sbhawikayi muhune athi walawal sadahatama nathi karaganna kamathida?

elesa lankeya ketikatha kalawe abhiwardhanayata, ehi supea්shanayata prabala madihathwimak karana atharathurama, swakiya nirmanathmaka hakiyawa osse lankeya ketikathawa thula 'dayasena gunasinha lakuna' sanituhan karannatada ohu samath wi thibena bawa ohuge ketikathakaranayehi anthargatha ananyatha lakunuwalin pene.
shri maha bodhin wahanse ha dantha dhathun wahanse apata watinne niwtoniya sankalpawalin bari nam niwtoniya sandarbhayehi un wahansela ge wadagathkama penwa di athi nisa da?

mata balaya gana aasawak naha.
ee sajith premadasa niyojya nayakaya karana awasthawe.
nowa 8:29 pawa, kolambaa, thri roda ratharu 550,000
lahiru kisiwak siya piyata kiweda natha.
eeka karanna apita mudal awashyayi.
ee nisa pasalta awashya une ee samanya thaththweta wada wens aakarayakin kota jiwithe kamathi karagannatayi.
eheth, mama ohuge kathawa asa, mama mage kathawa ahanna.
thakshanikawa sudusukam lath samajikayingen widhayaka mandalaya samanwitha weyi.

widhimath lesa lama mano widyawa gana praguna kala upadhidharin pasal wetha yumu kala yuthuyi.upadeshana niladharinge sahabhagithwayen jyeshta guruwarungen samanwitha winaya kamituwak sakas kirima wadagath.daruwanta nidahas lesa karunu idiripath karanna awasthawa salasa diya yuthuyi'' yayi da manthriwariya wiwadaya aarambha karamin prakasha kalaya.
eeta amatharawa udasana panaya kala haki thawath saukhya sampanna pana warga thibe.
sinhala bauddha balawega kerehi janathawa thula thibena wishwasaya dinen dina kshayaweminuyi pawathinne.
ehenam ithin thawath puwathakin hamu wenakan gihin ennam.
*nidahasa garu gambhirawa samare
chandrika aanti mata oyage nama kiwwa..
ee mema chitha්rapataye sigarat panaya karana darshanayak thibima hethuweni.
nalu niliyange kunu kandal awussala , puluwannam unta madak gahala eerishiyawen podi aathal ekak ganna kuhaka samajaya wethatayi kiyala.
eka: man liyala thibune champoliyan kiyala.
ohu wanchakarayek, dushakayek ho patu adahas darannek wiya hakiyi.

sahalwala sharirayata ahithakara rasayanikayin anthargathawimata pradhana washayen hethu wi aththe dashaka gananawak mulullehi pasehi anthargathawa pawathina karmika wisha rasayanikayan ha palibodha nashakayanya.
me thamayi saba kalakaruwo .
namuth hoda yayi sammatha kramayakata jiwath wannata anekuth darshana anugamanaya kirimenda puluwan.
me gana hoyana kenekta wadagath wena lipiyak me lipiya.
menna ee gana podi wistharayak chayarupa sahithawa.
eheth mehi kisiyam mano widyathmaka pasubimak thibe dayi yanna dana ganimata da apata awashya wini.
kalata welawata ha wadath sarthakawa thama wada katayuthu karaganime hakiyawa pawathina dinayaki.
harima wishalayi .
maha yuda ithihasaya eka kada imakata ragena aa manawa shishtacharaya, 18 wani siyawasa pamana wana wita “jathika rajya” goda nahamin lokayata wenas hadayak laba dunna.
kela gila gila oowa balana eka witharane apita karanna wenne..

man aayeth parak duma ihalata adda.pitawechcha dun guli nahayen katin eliyata giye mage aathmaya gatagahala thibba lanu gata kadagena, mage hitha sahallu karamin.mata loku thanikamak danenna gaththa.eetath wada his bawak.mata oone una thanikama raha karanna.eeka widinna.hamadamath eeka nowidinawa nemeyi.eeth hadawathata danena widiyata, wirahawa widinna.eeka marama rahak.wenada wage nathiwa bukiya athaarala dala, masenjaraya ballata dala, hand set eka wisikarala, chithrapati magaarala...
heta sita shri lankawata jiespi plas badu sahanaya balathmakayi
namuth mema parikshanaya sandaha yam rogiyaku peni sitina wita thama shariraya thulata lohamaya upakarana athulath kara athnam ee pilibandawa parikshanayata pera waidyawarayata pawasiya yuthuyi.
sirawatama maraya katha karapu dewal kathakalayuthuma dewal...
parlimenthuwa masa thunakin ras wi aththe dina pahayi: basnahira palath sabhawe ganapuranaya naha
kiyala kiyagenama diwwa.
eka sathiyaka ammage maligaweth eelanga sathiye thaththage maligaweth maruwen maruwata nawathi sitimata siduwima owunge olu awul karannak wiya.

nagala rajamaha wiharaye wiharadhipathi himiyan dina gananawaka sita wiharasthanayen baharawa gos sitina nisa ema himiyangen prakashayak laba ganimata aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwe niladharinta nohaki wi athayida usas polis niladhariyek pawasiya.
lankawada warthamanaye muhudu kebal gananawakata sambandha wi thibe.
menna mekayi aththa thathwaya.

ee wenuwen eli dakwana samaru kalambaata athithaya smaranaya karamin wachana tikak liyanna parana golayanta, aluth golayanta, bachalata, bachilata wagema pasal mithuranta arayum karanawa.bachekuge athitha aawarjanaya me samanga idiripath karanne kisindu sanshodhanayakin thorawayi.
“naya“ hewath nagaya wachanaye sthri linga padaya lesa panthiye siti daksha sisun siyallama ...	2
api eyawa passe gennamu..
pasugiya wasara hathalis gananata ma owun dedena hamuwi ho kathabaha ho kara nathi namuth, nithiyen da wenwi nathi nisa, nithyanukulawa jashodhaban yanu modi ge birinda we.
wedi wage wachana kiyana eka upathin ena puruddakda koheda?
patichchasamuppadaye me pilibandawa keti suthrayak sandahan wenawa.
kese namuth therawada sampradhayedi 'dharmaya', prathama dharma sanghayanawedi thahawuru aakarayata ,ee ayurinma pawathwa gena yama sadaha wadi wehesak ganna aakaraya daknata labenawa.
thamange ahe thiyena pol parale ganan nogena anith minihage ahe indikatta gana katha kirimayi boho wita siddha wenne.
ee nisa ma prekshakayange
drona danneth naha ehema golayek innawa kiyala.
mahath sanwegayata path raju, amathiwarunge kriya kalapaya pilibandawa kanassallata pathwuna.
melesa hondin praguna wana thuru bhawana kala yuthu ya.
ma mathpan bi natha.
eyata hethuwa, owunata samanya apata athi hakiyawata nomathi wuwath, wenath wisheshitha hakiyawangen purna wuwan lesa salaka samajaye samana thanak labadimaya.

kese wuwada wasara 35kata aasanna kalayak thisse pawathi mema gataluwata wisandum sewimata wathman rajaya wisin kriyathmaka karana lada wada piliwela ithamath sarthaka wa athi bawath, derata athara mithrathwaya thahawuru karamin eeta awathirna wana bawath amathya mahinda amarawira mahatha pawasayi.
eheth ohu suhada lesa sesu sirakaruwan samaga gewu kalaya thula yam dinaka nidahas wu wita jiwithaya aluthen arambaannata adhishtanayen siti bawata sakayak natha.
ethakota ehema nathuwa irisiya hithagena apsat yana kenek nam thamanta inne, eks ekka kopi bonna horen yanawada?
na na mama kiyannema na.
owun gana edath apa nam wishwasa kale naha.
eewa da musa ya
hamine umbaage handa umbaa hamine kiyana widihata liyahan .

adhyaksha mandala wenas karala thiyanawa.kop kamitu warthawe pasubima ganath katha kaloth?kop kamituwa kiyanne rajya departhamenthu ha amathyanshawalata amatharawa thiyana rajya aayathana wala katayuthu pariksha kirima sandaha wipaksha ha aandu pakshaye manthriwarun 31 kin samanwitha parlimenthuwa path karana kamituwak.kop kamituwata enakam aandu krama wyawasthawa anuwa rajya mulya palanaya sandaha kriyathmaka wana kriyadamayak thibenawa.
tharahak naha numbaa basa yanna...
mehida hindu sahithyey sadahan wana katha pawuthak thamayi, kiyikeshi kiyanne daitiya namathi rajadhaniye rajakala sumali kiyana rajuge diyaniya.
ethakota therenawane mewage barapathalakam ..!
ihatha purwikawa liya thabuwe sinhala nawakathawe nuthana wilasaya handunaganime punchi darshakayak lesa ya.
ithin madhawa thaman gawa thibuna salli tikak ha ammalagen ru 500k illa ganna thiranaya kala sayikale ful sarwis ekak karaganna!

kathawa ela aa...
”dewana loka yuddhayata pasu minis charitha thama aneka samanga hasiriya yuthu aakaraya pilibanda gnyanaya arbudayakata giyeya.
eeth ohu me wage awurudu ganaka idan winasha karanawa
podi trip ekak gihin adayi gedara aawe.
shri lankawe siya mehewara aarambha karan nata pamini mishanari kandayam athara kapipenena adhyapana mehewarak itu kala nikayak wanne di lasal bradarslaya.
mama awastha labaganna katayuthu karanawa.
api ara katha wuna wagema...
oonema deyak karannata puluwan.”
pasugiya wasara kihipaye balaporoththu kadawima yali mathuwa aththe wamanshayata labena sahaya wardhanaya wimeni.
nisi piliwela, mesayak matha wu mal banduna, wishala ajiwi pandawan dedeneku eyin samaharak pamanaki.
kese wuwath, suwathi diwiyak gathakirimen obe jiwithaye gunathmakabhawaya wadiwana athara, emagin jiwitha kalayada diguwanu atha.

piyata liyu eya udaya shantha sesu manthriwarunta penwiya.
janadhipathi waraya amathiwarunta pathwim dimedi ath deka ekata thaba aachara kaleya.

anagathaya, fasistwadayata, nyashtika yuddhayata ha nowalakwiyahaki paridi mlechchathwayata thudu denu ath da?
mokada, gange jala mattama manina thotalanga - nagalaganwidiye jala mapakaye adi 3.9 k satahanwela thibuna.
aramunak thibunoth thamayi winynyanaye pawathmata pihitak thiyenne.
udaharanayak widiyata ape gedara thamath redi madinne pol katu aguru isthirikkayakin.
ma kisi dineka ohuwa sabawin daka nathi nisa, ee pahadimata hethuwa mulumanin ma sayibar awakashaya haraha ma daka athi ohu ge katha, deshana saha wiwada aadiya bawa pahadiliya.
aparadha nadu kohomatath kal yanne ya.
ee anuwa me kalukumara sankalpaya wisthara kirimedi pahatha dakwena puranokthi ganath apata sithannata siduwenawa.
juli masa 31 wana asala pun pohoya dina was aaradhana pinkama wishala sadahawathun pirisakage sahabhagithwayen pawathwini.
pilithuru inima wenuwen panduwata paharadun bangladeshayata panduwara 41 yi pandu 1 k awasanaye labaganimata hakiwuye lakunu 142 k pamani.

prathipaththi matha deshapalanaya kala, pudgalikawa honda minisek lesa boho dena danna wasuta, thamange deshapalanaye awasan kalayedi ho hruda sakshiyak sahitha minisek lesa miyayannata salaswuye nam mahinda thama yalukamata wasuta kala loku gaurawanwitha salakimak lesatawath eya satahan kala hakiwa thibuni.
pudgalayan 400,000ta wada (nagaraye janagahanayen siyayata 30k pamana) yantham satharas sathapum 1.3k (woso nagarayen siyayata 2.4k) thula kotu keruni.
38 weni ade inna peshanta tikak amaruyi...
onna ohoma thama wade kerune...
tho boruwata marenna hadanne nathuwa aththata marila pala..
mema kandayama mayi masa 26 wana dina dakwa dina 6 k pura diwayina pura sancharaya karanu atha.
rohal gatha wi prathikara laba gath dhiwarayan wisin kalpitiya polisiyata me bawa paminili kara atha.
dara lod eka thama thiyanawa onna thiyana wada iwara welawath eeka karala denna.
mehi nishpadanaya saha adhyakshanaya raj kapurgemayi.

daruwanta dadi rakawarana awasi bawa ratatama pasak kala wallawa keshani manasa wikruthi mewani adhama narumayinta danduwama pamanak pramanawath natha wallawa, pamara keshani dariya paharagena giya adhamayage keruwawa dakiddi samajaya kanapita perali yame abhagya sampanna thaththwayaka athayi koyi katath dane.

mema siduwima sambandhayen dumriya departhamenthuwa danatamath widhimath ha pulul parikshanayak aarambha kara athi athara siddhiyata hethuwa ha ee sandaha wagakiwayuthu parshawayan anawaranaya wuwahoth ee pilibandawa nishchitha nigamanayakata elambaiya hakke ema parikshana awasan wu pasu heliwana thorathuru anuwa pamanak bawa danwanu kamaththemi.
upayana mudal godak pathirenawa.
mahapolawe paswage pramanayak minissu nawatha apagami wenawalu.
(mama ithin eewata kamathine ;)) mama kalinuth mita tikak withara samana sajiwikarana chithrapata dekak ganama obata kiyala thiyenawa wunata, ee dekin ekakatawath sinhala denda bari wuna newa.
oba sinhala nam me widiyowa balanna.
udasana hira payimath samaga muhudu werala nirikshanaya kirimata mama puduma kamaththak thiyenne .....
amishata katha kaleth me gana wadi dura wisthara ayagenma dana gannayi.

pasugiya rajaya samaye rawi karunanayaka mudal amathyawarayawa sitiyadi elambai giwisumak anuwa mema skan yanthra sapayima, sawikirima ha kirayathmaka kirima sandaha paudgalika samagamakata labadi thikhenawa.
honda welawata aawe naththe!
mama adanne naha ne pita wushu kalaya kiyala..
oya kelala thiyenne hathara watetama!!!
ee ayage adahas nowenna me gamana metharam dirgha nowenna thibba.
janadhipathithuma nitharama kiyanne apita oona honda wipakshayak kiyalayi.janathawa eyalata chandaya dunne parawal gane gahaganda nemeyine.
hama paththenma hirawela...
ehema nelanna gihin prashna wisandana aakaraya poddak pahadili karanawada?
me sayi ops eka kochchara sarthaka wunada kiyanawanam mithra hamuda sisiliyata paharadena dawase sathurange kisima aakarayaka yuddha sudanamak thibune nahallu..
palsami uba gama purama naya aran awaman widinawa mata dakinna ba
lankawe unta ithin prosesar kiwwoth ithin intel , intel kiwwoth prosesarne

thama pakshaye deshapalana mandala sabhika kumar gunarathnamta sha්ri lankawa thula nidahase siya deshapalana katayuthu sidukirimata awasthawa labadena lesa illamin peratugami samajawadi pakshaya janadhipathi maithi්rapala sirisena mahathata lipiyak yomukara thibe.ehi pitapathak aga්ramathya ranil wika්ramasinha mahatha wetha da yomu kala bawayi ema pakshaya penwa denne.
thawa liyanna eeka mata pituwahalak wewi
mehi dewanna nam rajya sewayata sambandha karyanwala pawathina sankirna swabhawayayi.
